The Fizzourth

2002-07-04

I met some UNC friends at The Constitution, a pub near their flat for some fourth of July celebration action. We decided that the title would have to do, although that particular document was not monikefied on the Fourth, because The Declaration of Independence probably is not the best title for a pub.

Some yummy watermelon and a carrot in a hotdog bun (+Tabasco) made up my patriotic picnic in the funky flat of the Bell St. Belles (and Beau).
